about.lineauno: You select a range of numbers and then you guess a number in that range.
about.lineados: If you guesses correctly, you win points equal to that range.
about.lineatres: If you lose, nothing happens! You can keep playing.
about.lineacuatro: You get 3 tries per day. After the third, you accumulate all the points.
about.lineacinco: If you are the player with most points on the day, you Win!

home.menor: Choose the lower number of your range
home.mayor: Choose the higher number of your range
home.numero_rango: Pick a number in that range
home.fuera_de_rango: Your number isn't in your range!
home.mayor_menor: Your lower number can't be higher than your highest one!
home.diez_numeros: Your range must be of at least 10 numbers!
home.tres_intentos: You already played 3 times today, Better luck tomorrow!
home.ganador: The random number is {{random}}, You win!
home.perdedor: The random number is {{random}}, but you guessed {{userInput}}: You lose!

register.error_datos: There seems to be a problem creating your account. Try again later.
